title: Dental Care
description: Brush teeth 2-3 times weekly to prevent dental disease

title: Weight Management
description: Monitor weight regularly and adjust diet as needed

title: Vaccination Schedule
description: Keep vaccinations up to date for optimal health protection

title: Regular Check-ups
description: Annual vet visits help catch health issues early

title: Exercise Routine
description: Daily walks and playtime keep pets fit and healthy

title: Parasite Prevention
description: Monthly flea and tick prevention is essential
